column3: yeah turn everything up yeah oh yeah turn everything up a little more   i want my baby to have your eyes i'm going against my own advice should i do new york i can't decide fashion week is more your thing than mine i can't even lie i'd rather stay inside i can't do suit and tie can't be in a room with you and stand on different sides one thing at a time i have to learn to hide one thing at a time emotions running high i wish you felt alright  pre just hitting my line all the time all the time all the you stay on my mind all the time all the time yeah   it takes some finesse i seen you finesse he can't know finesse you stay on my mind   you and your sister too hot to handle things would get cancelled i would make time for you commitment going the distance i'm new to all of this   it takes some finesse i seen you finesse he can't know finesse you stay on my mind
